name: Stacking Simulator (Ludum Dare 40)
description: My fourth installment in the Ludum Dare series. Stacking Simulator a unity physics game that consist of having the player stack up as high as they can before it all comes crashing down! (FYI: There tends to be a decent load time for the game,  as long as you are hearing music give it about 5-8 seconds + Don't play on full-screen or there will be considerable lag)
